title: Data Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

* Create dashboards to visualize data and insights.
* Collaborate on Python scripts for the toolchain, often through pair programming.
* Share your expertise and support teammates with challenging tasks.
* Engage with users to optimize tool utilization and address concerns.
* Actively participate in Scrum ceremonies to ensure alignment and progress.
* Explore new ways to enhance our simulation toolchain through innovation.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* A degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Engineering Physics, Robotics, or related fields (Ph.D., M.Sc., B.Sc., or equivalent experience).
* 3–5 years of professional experience in software engineering.
* Proficiency in Python.
* Experience with server-based distributed Linux systems.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.

  

**Meritorious**  

* Background in the automotive industry

  

**Application deadline:** 07-02-2025 **About Us**

  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
*"I find meaning in my work through tackling difficult technical questions that have a significant impact across a large engineering organization. With full autonomy, I get to work together with a passionate team, united by a shared goal: finding long-lasting solutions to new problems by continuously improving our systems and ourselves." - Team Member*  



#### **What is Software Flow?**


Software Flow is the backbone of our development process, providing a state-of-the-art build system that continuously tests and integrates our software into production vehicles. Our mission is to ensure that every change to our product—critical to Autonomous Driving and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems—is rebuilt and tested with precision.We use cutting-edge technologies like Bazel and its remote action caching to significantly speed up our development cycles. Additionally, we create and maintain internal tools to further optimize and automate these processes, allowing our engineers to focus on innovation rather than manual tasks.In short, Software Flow delivers a seamless, efficient, and reliable development environment that empowers our teams to push the boundaries of what’s possible in autonomous driving technology.  

  

**Who We Are As a Team**  

Trust and autonomy are fundamental to how we operate in Team Grey. We take responsibility for our roadmap, processes, and, importantly, our mistakes. Our core values include Uncompromising Ownership, Relentless Growth, and Humility. We focus on what matters and embrace simplicity when possible—choosing off-the-shelf solutions over custom ones when they meet our needs.  

  

**We Are Looking for:**


We are looking for someone with experience in build environments who is enthusiastic, curious, and interested in refining current practices. Our team isn't tied to specific tools or solutions—we are committed to finding the best ones. We work quickly and are not afraid to experiment, but we always prioritize user experience.

#### **Your mission and day-to-day tasks**

* **Influence and Grow:** Contribute to shaping our roadmap and your own career development.

  

* **Enhance Developer Experience:** Collaborate with our team to improve our CI environment and overall developer experience.

  

* **Own the Process:** Lead projects from ideation to production, ensuring reliability, performance, and availability.

  

* **Mentorship and Collaboration:** Support team members, contribute to design discussions, and collaborate closely with the team to develop innovative solutions.

  


### **What’s in it for you**

* Enjoy a flexible work approach and a genuinely good work/life balance. We do our best when everyone feels their best.
* A competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Work at the forefront of technology in one of Sweden’s largest and most innovative AI/ML companies.
* Collaborate with highly-skilled, creative individuals from all over the world, at the cutting edge of both industry and academia.

#### **Qualifications & experience**

##### **You will be well-suited if you have:**

* Proficient communication skills. .
* Solid experience with at least one programming language. We use Python, but experience with Go, C, C++, Rust, Haskell, or similar languages is also valuable.
* Experience in delivering projects, from gathering requirements to brainstorming ideas and shipping products to users.
* Experience writing clean, robust, and performant software that is easy to maintain by others.
* Experience explaining technical ideas to a variety of stakeholders, both technical and non-technical.

**Valuable Additions**


* Familiarity with the Bazel build system.


* Familiarity with remote execution systems.


* Experience with cloud-based software development.


* Experience designing software systems.


* Familiarity with declarative software configuration methodologies (IaC, GitOps, Nix).


* Experience with continuous integration tools and pipelining. Experience with orchestration systems like Kubernetes (K8s) is beneficial.


#### **More about Zenseact**

 **Our software makes a difference.**  

Using AI-based technology to create the ultimate driver support, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Every year, around 1,4 million people die in traffic while approximately 50 million people get injured. Many get disabled as a result of their injury. We can do better.

**One purpose, one product.**  

We’re a software company dedicated to revolutionizing car safety. By designing the complete software stack for autonomous driving and advanced driver-assistance systems, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Zenseact was founded by Volvo Cars, and the teams are based in Gothenburg and Lund, Sweden, Munich in Germany and Shanghai, China. When we aim for zero accidents faster, we strive to speed up the transition to safe automation. This is essentially achieved by making cars updatable – like a computer or a phone. With regular software updates, a vehicle can be made safer long after its production. By accelerating improvement loops, shortening development cycles, and deploying high-capacity software quickly, we can make cars safer, and faster.

**Culture with people at heart**  

To achieve our mission of saving lives and ending traffic accidents we must go where nobody has before. It requires us to venture into the unknown, pioneering new technology and pushing the frontier of autonomous driving. While there’s no denying our determination and expertise, we must stand united to succeed. By fostering a culture of support and enablement – a place of psychological safety where all of us can thrive – everything else will follow. We call this a **people-at-heart culture.** This culture means caring. It means the company cares about me, and we care about one another. It means sharing, so we give each other energy and have fun together. Our culture is also about belonging. It’s important to feel at home and that we can be ourselves at work. Finally, a people-at-heart culture means well-being. So, we enjoy the flexibility needed to be and do our best – at work and in life.

*Zenseact works proactively to create a culture of diversity and inclusion, where individual differences are appreciated and respected. To drive innovation we see diversity as an asset, which means we value and respect differences in gender, race, ethnicity, religion or other belief, disability, sexual orientation or age, etc.*  

  

*Interviews are held continuously, so we highly recommend that you submit your application at your earliest convenience.*

title: Data Engineer (SQL/Python)
description:
Nstart is one of Sweden’s top 15 largest fintech companies. We offer sustainable refinancing solutions to consumers, and we nudge them in the direction of debt freedom. We use advanced models and technical solutions with machine learning to generate deeper insights than what legacy banks and lenders can. We’re growing rapidly and expanding internationally.


We want to give everyone the opportunity of having a stable financial situation. Because sustainable household finances is the key to a stable economy and society. It is a great vision, but we are convinced that every human being can make a big difference. We, as well as our customers.


Our results speak clearly: We’ve already been highly successful in helping our clients improve their financial situations’, while creating strong value as a company and outperforming others. You’ll be joining us as a key person for the continued development of our modern data platform.


As a data engineer, you’ll be joining a fast-growing and profitable fintech player with co-workers who are true experts in their respective fields. People who are highly motivated, kind, and progressive. Joining a young and expanding company, you’ll find yourself in a situation where your work and effort will have huge impact on the future success of the company, while you’ll have endless opportunities to learn from others.


What you will do:

* Building and maintaining secure, scalable data pipelines for data ingestion and exposure (e.g., APIs) using Fivetran, Python and Lambdas.
* Implementing and enforcing data quality standards across all workflows.
* Translating business requirements into workable data models.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Data Science and Product team.

  


Experience:

* Strong programming skills in SQL and Python
* Hands-on experience designing and developing data pipelines
* Proven experience developing and integrating APIs.
* Experience with dbt, Snowflake or any of the modern datawarehouses is highly desirable
* Experience with any BI tool is good to have (OmniAnalytics, Looker, Tableau).


Who you are:

* You enjoy finding simple solutions to complex problems
* You take pride in the quality of your work
* You are always curious, always learning
* Your communication skills in English are excellent
* You are open, curious with a willingness to contribute to the joint success of the team


Location in Stockholm.


Sounds good to you? We are looking forward to your application!

title: Staff Software Engineer (m/f/d)
description:
In your role as a **Staff Software Engineer,** you will collaborate with the engineering team using agile development practices, supporting our engineers and discussing designs with the team, making sure all the key software quality characteristics are met. You will be a key individual contributor pairing and collaborating in the team, with strong hands on coding orientation. You will also provide mentorship to your team mates and aid on technical decision making.


As a Staff Software Engineer, you will work directly with our engineering department and contribute to the development and success of our customers, their customers - households and businesses, and our software engineering teams. This role will allow you to grow while making a tangible impact on the global push for CO₂ neutrality.

**Key Responsibilities**


As part of your role at Podero, your responsibilities will include:

* Evolving the technical design of the different components of our platform
* Contributing with the team on the implementation of changes and new capabilities
* Mentor the team on the relevant techniques, methods and tools to achieve the highest standards of quality of our Software solutions

**Desired Experience**


You have proven experience in developing and architecting complex software products and mentoring software teams, ideally in a B2B SaaS startup context:

* 5+ years of experience in Software Development
* Having built and delivered Software solutions operating in large scale environments with high levels of complexity
* Demonstrate high expertise using the Python programming language. Experience with the Django Web Framework and the Celery framework are also desirable.
* Experience and familiarity with PostgreSQL databases
* Strong understanding of Agile Software Development practices
* Experience with the React Web Framework and TypeScript
* Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform and Azure DevOps
* Familiarity with Software Reliability practices are a plus


We care about your ability to deliver great work and to be best-in-class in your specialization. As you will be a very senior team member, we expect you to be an expert in many of the domains mentioned above and to have a good generalist understanding of software development, engineering practices, startups and various stakeholders involved in the operation of a software company. We expect that you are eager to learn and able to find great solutions to challenging problems.

**Qualifications & Preferred Skills**


Recommended or desired qualifications you would need to fulfil this role:

* Professional level education in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a related area
* **Excellent communication and collaboration skills**, with a customer-centric approach to problem-solving. You work well across diverse teams, present ideas clearly and get buy-in.
* **Pragmatic** approach to delivering fit-for-purpose solutions that balance simplicity and effectiveness, avoiding needless complexity.
* **Familiarity and Drive** to leverage new technology (like **generative AI**) to streamline and improve processes.
* **Passion for Climate Tech** and making a measurable impact on the environment.
* **Self-Motivation** with a continuous drive to improve processes and learn from best practices.
* **Familiarity with the Energy Sector** or utilities industry is a plus but not required.

 **Benefits**

* **Mission-Driven Work**: Help reduce 4.4% of global CO₂ emissions by contributing to the transition towards a more sustainable energy grid and strengthening Europe’s energy independence.
* **Young and dynamic environment:** Flat hierarchies and a fun workplace—we’re a young team that gets along great!
* **Learning / Professional Growth**: Join a fast-paced, early-stage startup with significant learning and career advancement opportunities. Access to a strong network, including investors and key stakeholders in the energy and tech industries
* **Startup experience:** Experience firsthand how top companies create value from 0 to 1 while outpacing their competition and creating real-world value.
* **Employee stock options**: Benefit from the company's growth next to a competitive salary.
* **Success-based compensation:** Personal and company-based commission with the opportunity to influence your salary.
* **Work Flexibility**: Remote or hybrid work options with the ability to work in our Vienna office. We’d love to have you on site in Vienna for the first 8-12 weeks of your employment.
* **25 Days of Annual Leave**
* **Off-sites and travel budget:** Regular Team Events and exciting off-site experiences all across Europe. Travel budgets for customer visits, conferences, and industry events.
* **Additional Perks**: MacBook, plus any equipment (AirPods, etc.) you might need to get your work done as effectively as possible. Snacks, coffee, and fruit at the office.

 **About Us**


Energy suppliers face many challenges in their B2C business, including low margins, low differentiation of their electricity offers, emerging market players, unprofitable electricity trading, and limited IT resources.


Podero is a software platform for utilities that reduces the energy cost of flexible consumer devices like heat pumps, EVs and chargers, inverters, and home batteries by over 25%. Utilities roll out Podero using our white-label web app or integrating our API into their apps. Podero steers devices based on consumers’ PV production, fluctuating spot electricity prices, and the grid-stabilizing balancing energy markets. Podero enables utilities to trade the aggregate device power on the energy markets, ensuring a win-win situation for both utilities and consumers.


Customers of Podero include E.ON, TotalEnergies, oekostrom, KELAG, and more.

**Mission**


Our vision is to accelerate towards a world of abundant clean energy How? By creating the most profitable trading software for electric devices (Distributed Energy Resources).


We are solving one of the most fundamental problems of the electricity grid caused by the rapid consumer adoption of Distributed Energy Resources like heat pumps, EVs, and batteries, and the simultaneous exponential growth of renewable power generation. Renewables like solar and wind cause spikes in production, while Distributed Energy Resources cause spikes in consumption — unfortunately, mostly at opposite times.


We balance supply and demand in electricity markets by utilizing existing consumer devices as energy storage. Each time we shift the electricity use of consumer devices to match supply and demand, our software makes profitable trades, benefiting consumers and utilities. This balances the grid, which means that more consumers can use CO2-friendly Distributed Energy Resources and more renewables can be brought online.


In short, we are giving Podero back to the people!️

**Our Culture**


Podero is a group of relentless operators and driven domain experts who genuinely care about what they do. We all rally around the mission of decarbonizing electricity and feel proud about building an inspiring product. We value pragmatism, sharp focus, quick iterations, failing fast, and connecting our daily tasks to our mission. We are driven by customer obsession, working closely with customers to uncover what is true in our market, gathering frequent feedback, communicating openly, and building solutions that truly meet their needs. We value bias for action over perfectionism and overplanning and look for passionate individuals who complete their work with urgency and curiosity. We value learning on the job, learning from colleagues, customers, mentors, and competitors. We ensure everyone can collaborate transparently with trust, radical candor, and conscientiousness.


We encourage applications from people of all backgrounds and are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace.

title: Operations Manager Bank & Fintech
description:
*Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside you”, ”behind you” och ”before you”. Vi kallar det för ”The Iver way”.*
 Är du en driven och affärsorienterad ledare som vill göra skillnad i en snabbföränderlig och innovativ bransch? Vi söker nu en Operations Manager med starkt affärsfokus och leveransförmåga till vårt Bank & Fintech-team. Är du vår nya kollega?
   

  

**Om Iver**
 Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med expertis inom drift, cybersäkerhet, moln och innovation. Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder utan även för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.Med huvudkontor i Stockholm verkar Iver främst i Norden och har en agenda att fortsätta expandera. Iver har en omsättning på drygt 3 miljarder SEK och cirka 1 500 anställda som arbetar på något av våra 25 kontor i Norden.
   

  

**Din roll på Iver?**
 Bank och Fintech är vårt affärsområde som arbetar med kunder inom bank, försäkring och fintech. Samtliga kunder inom affärsområdet har mycket höga krav på informationssäkerhet och ser automation som en naturlig del av leveransen.
   

  

 I din roll som Operations Manager kommer du att leda ca 4- 6 gruppchefer och ansvarar för din verksamhet både utifrån ett affärs- och medarbetarperspektiv.
   

  

**Det Innebär B.la Att**
* Säkerställa synergier i de olika leveransteamen för bästa leveranskvalitet
* Prioritera resurser mellan teamen
* Tillsammans med dina ledare driva kompetensförsörjning och kompetensutveckling inom teamen för att möta morgondagens krav
* Driva och implementera ny teknik i samråd med arkitekt och ev. teknikchef


 Du kommer att arbeta nära våra kunder för att förstå deras behov. Rollen är en kombination av operativ styrning och strategisk utveckling och . Du kommer att följa upp ledarnas arbete för att säkerställa en kvalitativ leverans för kund, och skapa förutsättningar för dina ledare att lyckas i sina team.
   

  

 Du representerar din driftenhet i ledningsgruppen för vertikalen och bidrar till utveckling som helhet. Det är en mångfacetterad roll som ställer höga krav på dig och ditt ledarskap. För att lyckas i rollen skapar du samarbete mellan dina ledare och team, så väl som mellan din verksamhet och resten av Iver.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 Iver - We empower our Nordic society. Hos Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. På Iver är vi inkluderande och strävar efter genuint samarbete där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer – inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden. Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser och vi är övertygade om att det är så vi utvecklas.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
 Vårt ledarskap är tydligt och kräver styrkor i tre dimensioner, People, Business och Technology. Du har tidigare erfarenhet inom IT och tjänsteleverans mot kund och du har erfarenhet av att vara ledare över ledare med ett affärsansvar. Vi tror även att du i grund och botten har en teknisk förståelse inom IT-infrastruktur och erfarenhet av kraven på en IT-miljö inom bank/försäkring eller fintech.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen som Operations Manager tror vi att du har:
   

  

* Några års erfarenhet av leda ledare med personalansvar
* Hög teknisk kompetens inom relevanta områden och en bakgrund av tekniskt arbete
* Väl förtrogen med de tekniska utmaningarna och förutsättningarna för en IT-miljö inom såväl bank som fintech
* Erfarenhet av ekonomisk uppföljning och budgetansvar
* Erfarenhet av resource management
* Van att leda under förändring


**Som Ledare Är Du**
* Kommunikativ och trivs i en föränderlig miljö
* Har förmågan att coacha, leda och inspirera andra ledare
* Är en kulturbärare och visar vägen framåt
* Samarbetsvillig, tar ägarskap och hittar proaktiva lösningar
* Ansvarig för att leverans sker i linje med våra värderingar och vårt Brand Promise


**Placeringsort**
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Norden. För denna roll ser vi att du utgår från vårt kontor i Solna, Stockholm.
   

  

**Övrig Information**
 Vi har kunder inom alla branscher och sektorer inklusive säkerhetsklassad verksamhet därför genomför vi bakgrundskontroller i samtliga av våra rekryteringsprocesser.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-02-23. Du är välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Niclas Karlsson (niclas.karlsson@iver.se) eller TA – Manager Jennie Vilhelmsson (jennie.vilhelmsson@iver.se) vid frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Välkommen till Iver!
   

  

**We empower our Nordic society** 
 . Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation.
   

  

**Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.** 
 Vi säkerställer att sjukvården har tillgång till rätt patientdata, att samhällskritiska system aldrig ligger nere och att flygplanen landar säkert. Som en lyhörd och affärsnära helhetspartner möjliggör vi våra kunders innovation – idag och imorgon.
